definition: grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
can only/obliged to do sth/to have no other choice
without any better option/to have to/to be forced to
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
to have no alternative but to/to be obliged to
solely preoccupied (with one thing)/engrossed/focusing (on sth)/to look after only one aspect
solely engrossed in one thing/just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest)/simply/by all means/please feel free/do not hesitate (to ask for sth)

sentences.english: We have only two double rooms available but they are on different floors.
sentences.chinese: 我们只剩下两间双人房，但在不同的楼层。

sentences.english: I have nothing but some personal belongings.
sentences.chinese: 我只带了一些个人用品。

sentences.english: The cat under the table is Tama.
sentences.chinese: 桌子下面的那只猫叫塔玛。

sentences.english: Happy is a bird, it found only in fulfillment of the tree.
sentences.chinese: 快乐的是一只鸟，它只栖息在花繁叶茂的树上。

sentences.english: Talent never goes unrecognized, through constant endeavour will it be seen.
sentences.chinese: 世上没有怀才不遇，只看你是否百分百争取。

sentences.english: I only brought my passport and the Foreign Employment License.
sentences.chinese: 我只带了护照和外国人就业证。
他们全吃光了那只火鸡。

sentences.english: Hard find … a mossy leaf-tailed gecko is nearly impossible to spot on tree.
sentences.chinese: 这只苔藓满身的扁叶尾壁虎趴在树上，几乎认不出来。

sentences.english: White pearl cotton should be stitched only along the top edge.
sentences.chinese: 毛线只用于在袜边锁边。

sentences.english: Adjustable flybar clamp plates are supplied as standard with this machine model.
sentences.chinese: 只提供标准可调较搭尾模式。

sentences.english: Truth? A pebble of quartz? For once, then, something.
sentences.chinese: 真相？一块石英？只一次，便成永远。

sentences.english: The people, however, continued to sacrifice at the high places, but only to the Lord their God.
sentences.chinese: 百姓却仍在丘坛上献祭，只献给耶和华他们的神。

sentences.english: I am speaking English but you are acting like sheep, only looking wide-eyed.
sentences.chinese: 我讲的是英语，但你表现的像只绵羊，只是睁大眼睛。

sentences.english: No one could account for the fact that one of the boxes was extremely heavy.
sentences.chinese: 此中有只箱子特别重，可谁也弄不清是怎么回事。

sentences.english: Sense only the "maleficent contacts" and shut them out.
sentences.chinese: 只感知“有害接触”并拒之门外。

sentences.english: The sound spelled "miaow" is used only in talking to people.
sentences.chinese: 发出的“喵喵声”只在与人讲话时使用。

definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
can only/obliged to do sth/to have no other choice
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
